attributes.action: Removal of COVID-19 restrictions and return to a normal way of life
attributes.additional_details: Lifting of all restrictions, including local lockdowns, curfews, reopening of all entertainment venues, and allowing life to go back to normal in order to protect jobs and livelihoods of millions of citizens, whilst building herd immunity that will save lives in the long run. Putting in place measures to protect vulnerable people and new messages in terms of hygiene
attributes.background: Current lockdown policies are producing devastating effects on short and long-term public health and our economic life and we should allow life to go back to normal as soon as possible, whilst putting in place measures to protect the most vulnerable members of society

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Lift local lockdowns and Covid-19 restrictions in England: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551469

Fund & provide services to allow the vulnerable to shield & re-open the economy: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552023
